page.title: 04GAMES PLAYED BY A GIRL OF 11
page.content: The games I play at school in the winter are things like Netball or sometimes we just walk around the playground talking and getting hit by the football.In the summer we are allowed onto the field and we play Un, Deux, Trois.You play this by saying, "Un,Deux,Trois," and then you do a handstand.The one that stays up the longest is the next caller.In the winter at home we have snowball fights or try to see who can make the biggest Angel.In the summer we go out for bicycle rides and play on the swings at Grindley Park.At Grindley Park there are 2 big swings,2 baby swings, a roundabout and a slide.There is a bench where people can sit and the designers have provided a bin so that we can be tidy and litter conscious.
